body_html: The problem is that it changes the behaviour of a lot of functions we currently have, so it completely breaks bw compatibility and is a surprise for Lua torch users. But I guess it makes sense to discard the dimension, and have an optional flag that prevents squeezing it.

body: The problem is that it changes the behaviour of a lot of functions we currently have, so it completely breaks bw compatibility and is a surprise for Lua torch users. But I guess it makes sense to discard the dimension, and have an optional flag that prevents squeezing it.
